You'll laugh together at the funny puppet shows featuring moms and their baby animals. It's an exciting world for you and your baby to discover together!

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Urbanity - EP102
programme.desc: In this episode of Kids' Planet, Nova will guide the children through an exciting journey through the world of "Urbanity" where the children will discover that with a good attitude and respecting all people equally, their life will be more fun, happy, and surrounded by friends!

programme.title: Mellodees - Humpty Dumpty - EP15
programme.desc: Dee and Lil Mello work their magic to put their guitar back together again.

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy - Sunny Bunnies: Get Busy Ep14 - EP114
programme.desc: In a new spin-off series of mini-episodes - ‘Sunny Bunnies Get Busy’ - the characters are on hand to entertain and engage viewers in various colourful and creative activities and inspire children to 'Get Busy'.

programme.title: Giselle and the Green Team - The Case of the Creeping Development - EP101
programme.desc: Gisele and the Green Team fight Nick Slick and his building of a New Hotel to save a beach and a bunch of sea turtle eggs.

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2 - Wid, Wild Horses / Safari Away From Me - EP225
programme.desc: Preston's latest get-rich-quick scheme to sell wild mustangs goes awry; a man causes a baby elephant to become separated from her mother.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - If the Fossil Fits / A Golden Opportunity - EP103
programme.desc: When Kent discovers a dinosaur fossil, the SECRET LAB KIDS learn about fossils, DNA and even go back to prehistoric times to determine if Kent has discovered a completely new dinosaur! / When Angie loses her mother’s favorite – and valuable – gold bracelet at the beach, our heroes build a homemade metal detector to find it.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - Fashion Bot Fiasco - EP120
programme.desc: Lisa and Radley create a Fashion Bot which sparks interest from a national toy chain, but the kids focus their attention on a local store and a science fair.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Call Me Hugzilla - EP106
programme.desc: A superhero lesson on creative thinking leads Billy to question what it means to be a monster.

programme.title: Yeti Tales
programme.desc: Join Us in Yeti Tales !

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. Many things can happen in Misha’s world; especially exciting adventures, mysterious investigations, hilarious competitions... all with a feeling of close friendship.

programme.title: Music Box
programme.desc: Get ready to dance and sing-along to music-filled episodes

programme.title: LOL Block
programme.desc: A crazy collection of hilarious comedy series featuring shows like, Jelly Jam, Crazy Candies, Karim & Noor, and Talking Tom.

programme.title: Baby Riki
programme.desc: The show covers all aspects of a child’s life from physical well-being to cognitive and soft skills. The musical stories are based around age-appropriate experiences with educational concepts introduced in familiar surroundings and context for infants.

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends Minis
programme.desc: Get ready to watch Talking Tom and Friends at their cutest! Mini in size, but massive in fun, the Minis check out the day-to-day world of the friends we all know and love where they do the most ordinary things in the most extraordinary ways.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo the Wildlife Ranger introduces the secrets and wonders of nature and wildlife around us and kickstarts a curiosity and passion for nature in kids. With engaging missions and adventures, kids have fun while learning positive lessons!

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. From the Amazon jungles to the deepest oceans, and to the hottest deserts, Paula and friends solve problems, have fun and make more friends along the way!

programme.title: Angry Birds Toons
programme.desc: Check out Angry Birds Toons compilations! Each compilation has several episodes from your favorite shows including Angry Birds, Piggy Tales, and Stella!

programme.title: Bino & Fino
programme.desc: Bino & Fino is about a brother and sister named Bino and Fino who live with their grandparents 'Mama' and 'Papa' in a modern day city in Africa. Bino and Fino have many adventures where, with the help of their friend Zeena the Magic Butterfly, they discover and learn things about the world.

programme.title: Horaci the Inuit
programme.desc: Packed with adventure, fun and excitement, HORACI THE INUIT will transport you to the Lands of the North where, together with his best friend Sedna, he will have to solve all kinds of mysteries! Horaci the Inuit takes place in a remote village and talks about universal values such as caring for nature, being intuitive and open-minded and, above all, having a loving respect for family and friends!

programme.title: Chefclub Kids
programme.desc: With Chefclub Kids, the little ones get their hands dirty all while having fun in the kitchen. Whether they're learning to prepare dinner, bake goodies, or explore new flavors, Chefclub Kids is a way for children to gain confidence through cooking!

programme.title: Hogie the Globehopper
programme.desc: Hogie the Globehopper is a fun tv show that will inspire a curiosity and fascination about the world and its people. Hogie and his friends Lorna, Bernie and Floaty travel the world, making lots of friends along the way.

programme.title: Bernard - Bernard - At The North Pole
programme.desc: Bernard gets bored trekking across the frozen Arctic wastes. Some abandoned equipment becomes a source of great entertainment, but not for long.

programme.title: Bernard - Bernard - The Package
programme.desc: Zack tries to steal a parcel which Bernard is carrying. At first he succeeds, but Bernard doesn't give up that easily.

programme.title: Bernard - Bernard - Sleepwalker

programme.title: Bernard - Bernard - The Unicycle

programme.desc: Although Bernard has been shipwrecked, his real problems begin when he finds an abandoned motorboat which could get him back to shore.

programme.title: Bernard - Bernard - The Prisoner
programme.desc: Bernard makes a daring escape from prison, but once he's out, he realises that perhaps life inside wasn't so bad after all.

programme.title: The Fixies
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment.
